flawed_nl_solution:
Starting with the bonus, Maurice would receive it 30 / 10 = <<30/10=3>>3 times.
This means the bonus money, would make up to 3 * 6 = $<<3*6=81>>81.
Maurice would do 30 tasks, so for all of them, he would receive 30 * 2 = $<<30*2=60>>60.
So in total Maurice would make 60 + 81 = $<<60+81=141>>141 for finishing 30 tasks.
#### 141

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
